com.io7m.r2.core.shaders.types

Interface R2ShaderTranslucentInstanceSingleType<M>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of parameter data
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceUsableType, R2DeletableType, R2ShaderTranslucentInstanceSingleUsableType<M>, R2ShaderTranslucentType<M>, R2ShaderTranslucentUsableType<M>, R2ShaderType<M>, R2ShaderUsableType<M>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2RefractionMaskedDeltaShaderSingle, R2ShaderTranslucentInstanceSingleVerifier, R2TranslucentShaderBasicPremultipliedSingle

    public interface R2ShaderTranslucentInstanceSingleType<M>
extends R2ShaderTranslucentInstanceSingleUsableType<M>, R2ShaderTranslucentType<M>
    The type of shaders for rendering the surfaces of translucent single instances.
